review.title: “plywood knowledge in 6 years”
review.pros: Pros – Having a vast and Basic knowledge of Plywood and also having a knowledge of marketing of Plywood
review.cons: Cons – NEED A GOOD BOSS That is helpful to get work done on time
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please first look the capaability and then give the work according to capability.

review.title: “Friendly work environment”
review.pros: Pros – I was well empowered at work and was allowed/encouraged with taking decisions and sharing my views at major management meets.
review.cons: Cons – We did not have enough holidays (as in terms of religious/cultural holidays). Office infra-structure is not up to the mark.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – HR training should be arranged on a regular basis. Employees appraisal system should be strongly in practice. Jobs and responsibilities of every employee should be proper checked and re-defined in line with actual requirements.

review.title: “Indian company enroute to global processes”
review.pros: Pros – Vibrant growing organisation , trying to inculcate MNC style processesHas good brand value in market
review.cons: Cons – Product availability, logistics and stocking is a mess
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get production schedules & logistics gaps filled

review.title: “Politics at all level, senior management in the clutches of middle management”
review.pros: Pros – No specific reason to work for this company. Disorientation at all level.
review.cons: Cons – Promoter interference in day to day working, promoters tussle between themselves,
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The RSM and GSM should start working in the market. Favoritism should be stopped immediately.

review.title: “It has been a huge exposure in terms of the implementation of new processes and systems”
review.pros: Pros – New initiatives trying to get into the line of MNC and introducing new process or systemsnever backs from the new processLearning and Growing OrganisationEmphatic to employee situation in any form of requirement
review.cons: Cons – Lack of enthusiastic form of work as a teamrecommendation work more then credibility
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “A well organised organisation.”
review.pros: Pros – Well organised.Systematic way of working culture. As per as ADD support is concern it is the best in its industry.
review.cons: Cons – Weak in handling distributors in some of the areas.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Some power to the field force to control the distributors.
